resources.string:
Matthew 26
19And the disciples did as Jesus had directed them, and they prepared the Passover.
20When it was evening, he reclined at table with the twelve. ______"

Jesus, 
	 with your Father and Holy Spirit 
		 You presided over all creation,
		 You buried all the earth with water 
			 in your righteous judgement, and 
		 You rain water on the earth 
			 to bless your people with life, 
	 yet you chose to be baptized 
		 by John in the Jordan river 
			 with the very water you created, 
	 you bring new human life through water, 
	 and even gushed water and blood 
		 from your side when you had died 
			 paying the full price 
				 for our redemption 
			 to wash us pure 
				 once for all. 
	 Please wash my feet 
		 by way of my confession and contrition
			 so that I may keep being 
				 fully free again of that 
					 grimy sin accumulation
				 that still sticks to me 
			 as we walk through this dusty world.
		 And may I also be a foot washer
			 in your kingdom 
				 here in our unique time on earth 
					 and in eternity
						 where you live and reign for ever and ever.
 â€“ Amen.
